serverInfo.name: skillsync
serverInfo.description: Security-gated skill management for Claude Code. Search, scan, install & manage skills with 60+ threat detection patterns.

tools.name: skillsmp_search
tools.description: Search SkillsMP marketplace for skills by keyword. Returns names, descriptions, authors, and GitHub links.

tools.name: skillsmp_ai_search
tools.description: AI-powered semantic search on SkillsMP. Uses Cloudflare AI for relevance matching.

tools.name: skillsmp_scan_skill
tools.description: Scan a skill's GitHub source for security threats: prompt injection, reverse shells, credential theft, supply chain attacks, crypto mining, and 60+ other patterns.

tools.name: skillsmp_search_safe
tools.description: Search SkillsMP and auto-scan top results for security threats. Combines keyword search with vulnerability scanning.

scanTop.description: How many top results to security-scan (default 3)

tools.name: skillsmp_install_skill
tools.description: Security-scan a skill from GitHub, then install it to ~/.claude/skills/. Blocks on critical threats. Requires force=true for medium/high risk.

name.description: Skill name (inferred from URL if omitted)

force.description: Force install: skip medium/high risk block, overwrite existing

tools.name: skillsmp_uninstall_skill
tools.description: Remove an installed skill from ~/.claude/skills/ by name.

name.description: Name of the skill directory to remove

tools.name: skillsmp_list_installed
tools.description: List all installed skills with security status and risk levels from last scan.

refresh.description: Force re-sync before listing (re-scans all skills)

tools.name: skillsmp_audit_installed
tools.description: Deep security audit of a specific installed skill. Forces a fresh scan and returns a detailed threat report.

name.description: Name of the installed skill to audit

tools.name: skillsmp_suggest
tools.description: AI-powered skill recommendations based on installed skills. Optionally provide context about your current project.

context.description: What you're working on (e.g. 'React testing', 'Python automation')

tools.name: skillsmp_compare
tools.description: Side-by-side comparison of two skills including security scan results. Accepts GitHub URLs or installed skill names.

skillA.description: GitHub URL or installed skill name for first skill

skillB.description: GitHub URL or installed skill name for second skill

tools.name: skillsync_configure
tools.description: Manage sync subscriptions and settings. Add/remove search subscriptions, configure sync interval, risk threshold, and conflict policy.

conflictPolicy.description: How to handle locally modified skills (action=set)

tools.name: skillsync_sync_now
tools.description: Run a sync cycle: poll subscriptions, diff against installed skills, install/update/remove. Use dryRun=true to preview.

tools.name: skillsync_status
tools.description: Show sync engine status: managed vs manual skills, subscriptions, last sync time, next scheduled sync.
